meanings.definition: Reductases: enzymes that catalyze reduction reactions
meanings.sent1: The reductases in our bodies play a crucial role in breaking down food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study reductases to understand how they affect chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The reductases at the party were busy turning cupcakes into crumbs!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the reductases, slowly breaking down barriers in her way.
meanings.sent5: The reductases worked tirelessly, like tiny workers in a chemical factory.

meanings.definition: Reductases: proteins that help convert one substance into another by reducing it
meanings.sent1: The reductases in the plant helped transform sunlight into energy.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use reductases to improve the quality of crops.
meanings.sent3: The reductases in the kitchen magically turned milk into cheese!
meanings.sent4: His kindness acted like reductases, changing her perspective on life.
meanings.sent5: The reductases were like alchemists, turning ordinary ingredients into something extraordinary.
